function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shared areas in condo buildings seen as risky inconvenience due to COVID-19","Impact":"Decline in popularity of condo buildings, potential health risks for occupants","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols, enforce social distancing measures, provide protective equipment","Technologies":"Air purifiers, automatic cleaning technologies, UV lamps","People":"Occupants of condo buildings","Owner":"Building management and developers"},{"Description":"Limited or zero access to common areas and non-essential amenities in residential buildings","Impact":"Decreased satisfaction of occupants, potential impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implement strict cleaning and disinfection protocols, enforce social distancing measures, provide alternative amenities or services","Technologies":"Indoor air quality monitoring, contactless delivery technology, fitness center social distancing measures","People":"Occupants of residential buildings","Owner":"Building management and developers"},{"Description":"Shift in housing interior trends towards healthier and touch-free technologies","Impact":"Changes in design and construction trends, potential financial impact for developers and contractors","Mitigation":"Incorporate germ-resistant materials, smart technologies, and touch-free systems into building design","Technologies":"Germ-resistant flooring, air purifiers, voice control technologies","People":"Developers, contractors, architects, and interior designers","Owner":"Construction companies and design firms"}]}
